title: Intro landing page routing and navigation updates

requirements.summary: Add a new Intro page that prominently displays the provided banner image and includes a clear CTA to navigate to Home.
acceptanceCriteria: A new React page component exists for the Intro page (e.g., IntroPage) and renders the uploaded image prominently (e.g., as a full-bleed background/hero image or centered banner).
Intro page includes at least one obvious control (button/link) labeled in English (e.g., "Enter", "Continue", or "Go to Home") that navigates to the Home page route.
The image renders correctly in production as a static frontend asset (not fetched from the backend).

file_operations.description: Create the Intro page component that uses the static banner image as the primary visual and includes a prominent CTA that links to the Home route. Use shadcn-ui (e.g., Button) for the CTA styling consistency; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Add the provided uploaded banner image as a static public asset so it is bundled/served by the frontend in production (no backend fetching).

requirements.summary: Update routing so the app opens on Intro at "/" and moves the existing Home page to a dedicated route without breaking existing routes.
acceptanceCriteria: The Home page is reachable via a stable route (e.g., "/home") and renders the existing HomePage content.
All previously existing routes continue to work as before (/ranks, /divisions, /lore, /history, /photo, /posters).
All internal links that previously pointed to "/" for Home are updated to point to the new Home route where appropriate.

file_operations.description: Update TanStack Router route definitions so "/" renders the new Intro page and the existing HomePage is moved to a stable dedicated route (e.g., "/home"), while preserving all existing routes (/ranks, /divisions, /lore, /history, /photo, /posters).
Review and update any internal references that assume Home is at "/" (if any) to use the new Home route (e.g., "/home").

requirements.summary: Adjust site navigation so Home points to the new Home route and Intro is not mislabeled as Home; keep active-link highlighting correct.
acceptanceCriteria: Top navigation includes a "Home" link that routes to the Home page route (not the Intro route).
The Intro route is either not shown in the primary nav, or is clearly labeled as "Intro" if included.
The active-link highlighting works correctly for the Home route and other routes after the routing change.

file_operations.description: Update primary navigation links so "Home" routes to the new Home route (e.g., "/home"), ensure the Intro route is not mislabeled as Home (hide it from the main nav or label it explicitly if included), and keep active-link highlighting behavior correct after the route change. Use shadcn-ui Button as currently used; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
If needed to support the new Intro experience, adjust layout-level navigation behavior (e.g., optionally hide or simplify nav on the Intro route) while keeping the rest of the site navigation intact.
